attributes.action: learn lessons from the past experiences of the Cold War.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Whilst a diplomatic response to Moscow's refusal to extradite Andrei Lugovoi, to stand trial in the UK for the murder of Alexander Litvinenko, is necesssary, the expulsion of 4 Russian diplomats is not a proper move. It will simply take us back to the 'tit for tat' days of the Cold War and achieve nothing more than another long-term souring of relations. The 21st century demands 21st century-style diplomacy.
